Super Mario Bros

The main character(mario) must go on adventure through the obstacles to save the princess from his enemy (Bowser). Mario jumps, runs, and power-ups to defeat the enemy and overcome the challenges, getting coin and finish the stage as fast as possible to gain the highest score.

In this game player can jump, walk, runs and power-up

To run the game optimally you must have at least python 3.9.0 (you can check the version by typing "python -V" in terminal), install pycharm as well as pygame also install pytmx

How to run the game:

- Install python (at least 3.9.0)

- Install pycharm

- Install pygame

- Install pytmx

- Open the .zip file

- Extract the .zip file

- Open the pycharm -> Open folder -> Find the directory of the file(game) -> Open

- Run the code

- Enjoy the game

- To exit just close the window

How to play?

- Press enter to start the game

- Move the Mario using arrow keys

- Press shift to run

- Defeat the enemy by jumping on them

- Break the "?" boxes to get coin

- Power up using mushroom (In this power up, Mario become bigger and able to destroy brick blocks, also gain an extra life)
